title: JOHNZON-188 Apply Portable Java Contracts
JOHNZON-188 Apply Portable Java Contracts
Add tests for JsonParser#hasNext().
body:
I added some tests relating JsonParser#hasNext() behavior.
Unfortunately both emptyInput() and blankInput() methods fail even in the latest snapshot.
Thank yor for tackling this problem.

title: Fix issues related to JsonPointer remove operation
Fix JsonParser.getValue
body:
JsonParser.getValue API method does not work correctly if the current value is other than array or object.

Some test cases are added for getting value of string, number, integer, true, false and null.
Please change the name of test methods if they does not match the naming convention.

title: Fixes merged from trunk
body:
I'll open up a discussion on the Johnzon dev list for this, but this effectively comes from a suggestion from @rmannibucau here: http://tomee-openejb.979440.n4.nabble.com/DISCUSS-switching-TomEE8-to-master-tp4683438p4683734.html to copy master, and downgrade the APIs to match the 1.0.0 version; effectively creating a 1.0.x version with the fixes from trunk.

I'll attempt to cross-reference this to the set of JIRAs that this would cover and verify them as well.

Any feedback is most welcome. Thanks in advance for your consideration.

title: deserialization of enum from deserializationContext (normally used inside jsonbDeserializers)
body:
Deserialization of enum from deserializationContext (normally used inside jsonbDeserializers).
This pull also contains a partial refactor for Mappings to manage TypeVariable and ParameterizedType.
I also fixed milli, micro, nano seconds formatting for date/temporal accessor types being truncated.

title: complete support for DateFormat
JsonbConfig injectable by JAX-RS Provider
JAX-RS MessageWriter/MessagerReader with Priority (so that user can d…
body:
…efine and provide his own)

JsonbConfig injectable via Jax-RS API
Better support for generics types
Support for JsonbDeserializers/JsonbSerializers defined in interfaces or abstract classes
Support for default deserialization from string to enum
Fix to dateformatting (date format was not properly used in deserialization)

title: JOHNZON-151: Fix serialization of nulls inside a collection inside a parent object
body:
* Fixes NullPointerException on attempting to access getClass of null object.
* Fixes silently ignoring nulls within a list/array when they are contained by a higher object.

title: Rework of JSON-B Type Converters to use Mapper Converters and add Java8 Date/Time Converters to Mapper Project
Rework of JSON-B Type Converters to use Mapper Converters and add Java8 Date/Time Converters to Mapper Project
Add support for converting java.time.Instant to JSON string and vice versa
body:
Includes new converter with test cases.

Will parse JSON strings into an Instant so long as they are in a ISO_8601 date+time compliant format
e.g.:
2007-12-03T14:15:30.00Z
2007-12-03T17:15:30+03:00
2007-12-03T08:15:30-06:00
2007-12-03T08:15:30.000-06:00

Instant parsed to String will be in ISO_8601 format and have the local system timezone in the representation:
e.g. Say the system timezone is +02:00 and the Instant is 2007-12-03T14:15:30.00Z then the resulting String would be 2007-12-03T16:15:30+02:00

title: JOHNZON-131: JSON-B Requires Non-Exported Internal Package from Mapper
JOHNZON-129: Make JAX-RS Dependencies Optional
JOHNZON-127: Make CDI Dependencies Optional in OSGi
JOHNZON-128: Fix Checkstyle Error for JohnzonBuilder.build() Method
JOHNZON-126: Rename JohnsonJsonb to JohnzonJsonb
Fix long number parse in collections, and unify non-integral parse
body:
On one code path non-integrals parsed as Double, on the other path
as BigDecimal.
Now it's always BigDecimal.
